docs.text:
vSphere & Horizon Upgrades


07/25/18


Overview


vSphere 6.7 now supports suspend and resume with NVIDIA vGPUs so we need to upgrade to take advantage of all the enhancements announced in the Horizon View 7.5 release. 
Here's a good 
post
 with more info... These are my notes for upgrading everything.


Resources




Update sequence for vSphere 6.7 and its compatible VMware products


VMware Product Interoperability Matrices



Best practices for upgrading to vCenter Server 6.7


Important information before upgrading to vSphere 6.7


Build numbers and versions of VMware ESXi/ESX




Phase 1 - Horizon Upgrades






Horizon 7.5.1


App Volumes 2.14


User Environment Manager 9.4






Phase 2 - vRealize & NSX Upgrades






vRealize Orchestrator 7.4


vRealize Log Insight 7.6.1


NSX for vSphere 6.4.1






Phase 3 - vSphere Upgrades






vCenter Server Appliance 6.7


ESXi 6.7


vSAN 6.7


NVIDIA vGPU for vSphere 6.7






Phase 4 - Workspace One






Identity Manager 3.2


Workspace One UEM 9.5
